Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| copolymer stability |
| copolymer performance |
| BDT |
| core unit |

Note: In the original paragraph, "high performance" and "stability" are properties of the copolymer. Therefore, they are presented as "copolymer stability" and "copolymer performance" in the table.

[Explanation: "BDT as the core unit" implies that BDT is a type of material or unit used in the copolymer production, so it is considered a property value as it specifies the material used to obtain the desired property.]
